reference.detail: Sch\"{o}tzig U. and Schrader H., Halbwertszeiten und Photonen-Emissionwahrscheinlichkeiten von h\"{a}ufig verwendeten Radionukliden, PTB-Bericht, PTB-Ra-16/3, Braunschweig, September 1989

Mesurement.Comments: see \cite{Nahle_2018_Ga67}; The final result is calculated as unweighted mean of the two methods with the larger uncertainty of the two single results.
see \cite{Nahle_2018_Ga67}; The final result is calculated as unweighted mean of the two methods with the larger uncertainty of the two single results.
